item.title: #en @ 1531432270178881536
item.description:
Big news, peeps!
1) I am leaving my role as open data lead for Waka Kotahi NZTA, and will be a free agent / available for exciting new things from late June :)
2) I may well be selling my house and land up north too.

item.title: #en @ 1531310980667518976
item.description: For those who use the UK climate gridded dataset (HadUK-Grid), it has been updated to include 2021. This update also extends the monthly gridded rainfall reconstructions backwards to 1836, thanks to the #RainfallRescue citizen science project. Open data: https://t.co/CmeNLPdMuv
